appName: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
displayName: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
display_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
display_long_description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu 🌟

[media]

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  🏴‍☠️


[media]


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

[media]

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich Emmy-nominated experience lasting 1-4 hours ⏳, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins 🌙, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

[media]

[media]

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) 🏆

[media]


[media]

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu 🎭, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer 🎬


[media]

[media]

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! 🏴‍☠️👑



[media]

Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.
